You can initiate a definition and kick-start your business process even if your business process does not meet the entry criteria.

ol.li: Click the Initiate Definition button. The business Process search bar appears with the most recently updated business process displayed on top.
Select a business process from the list displayed. You can also type the ID of the business process to search it

conbody.p: The business process is successfully initiated and the pop-up message displays a success message along with a link to navigate to the created record.
